sentences.sentence: It also needs highly difficult singing skills of breath, rhythm, intonation, melisma and parlando singing.
sentences.translation: 在发声演唱上要求高难度的呼吸、节奏和音准、花唱以及朗诵式演唱等技巧。

sentences.sentence: It also needs highly difficult singing skills of breathe, rhythm, intonation, melisma and parlando singing.
